rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gnupg2" ln -sf ../gnupg/gpg-preset-passphrase \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gnupg2/gpg-preset-passphrase" ln -sf ../gnupg/gpg-protect-tool \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gnupg2/gpg-protect-tool"
mv "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/gpg2" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/gpg" ln -sf "gpg" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/gpg2" mv "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/gpgv2" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/gpgv" ln -sf "gpgv" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/gpgv2"
